name: gospel says (i lied)
description:
You’re a prophet and it’s the end of the world, or so your visions say. But you wield the words of a god (goddess, gods, inexplicable higher power or being?) and it doesn’t matter much that they want the apocalypse... They’ll have to make you write it.
  • Length: Short. < 3k words. < 10 minutes
  • Multiple endings: Three main endings with minor variations depending on your choices.
  • Content warning: 
    • Some statements may be construed as suicidal ideation.
    • Contains non-graphic depictions of violence, destruction, and death.
    • Has themes of religion and spirituality.
    • May use strong language.
  • Made within three days as an entry to inkJam 2021.
  • Made with ink and Calico.
